Documentation for the Code¶

This class contains all the mutations.

class tangogql.schema.DeleteDeviceProperty(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class represents mutation for deleting property of a device.

mutate(info, device, name)[source]¶

This method delete a property of a device.

Parameters:
  • device (str) – Name of the device
  • name (str) – Name of the property
Returns:

Returns ok = True and message = Success if successful, ok = False otherwise. If exception has been raised returns message = error_message.
Return type:

DeleteDeviceProperty
class tangogql.schema.Device(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class represent a device.

info¶

This method fetch all the information of a device.

resolve_attributes(info, pattern='*')[source]¶

This method fetch all the attributes and its’ properties of a device.

Parameters:pattern (str) – Pattern for filtering the result. Returns only properties that match the pattern.
Returns:List of attributes of the device.
Return type:List of DeviceAttribute
resolve_commands(info, pattern='*')[source]¶

This method fetch all the commands of a device.

Parameters:pattern (str) – Pattern for filtering of the result. Returns only commands that match the pattern.
Returns:List of commands of the device.
Return type:List of DeviceCommand
resolve_exported(info)[source]¶

This method fetch the infomation about the device if it is exported or not.

Returns:True if exported, False otherwise.
Return type:bool
resolve_properties(info, pattern='*')[source]¶

This method fetch the properties of the device.

Parameters:pattern (str) – Pattern for filtering the result. Returns only properties that matches the pattern.
Returns:List of properties for the device.
Return type:List of DeviceProperty
resolve_server(info)[source]¶

This method fetch the server infomation of a device.

Returns:List server info of a device.
Return type:List of DeviceInfo
resolve_state(info)[source]¶

This method fetch the state of the device.

Returns:State of the device.
Return type:str

This class represents an attribute of a device.

This method fetch the coresponding quality of an attribute bases on its name.

Returns:The quality of the attribute.

resolve_timestamp(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This method fetch the timestamp value of an attribute bases on its name.

Returns:The timestamp value
Return type:float
resolve_value(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This method fetch the coresponding value of an attribute bases on its name.

Returns:Value of the attribute.
Return type:Any

class tangogql.schema.ExecuteDeviceCommand(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class represent a mutation for executing a command.

mutate(info, device, command, argin=None)[source]¶

This method executes a command.

Parameters:
  • device (str) – Name of the device that the command will be executed.
  • command (str) – Name of the command
  • argin (str or int or bool or float) – The input argument for the command
Returns:

Return ok = True and message = Success if the command executes successfully, False otherwise. When an input is not one of the scalar types or an exception has been raised while executing the command, it returns message = error_message.
Return type:

ExecuteDeviceCommand

This method fetches all the families using the pattern.

  • domain (str) – Domain for filtering the result.
  • pattern (str) – Pattern for filtering the result. Returns only properties that matches the pattern.
Returns:

List of families.
Return type:

This method fetches all the members using the pattern.

  • family (str) – Family for filtering the result.
  • pattern (str) – Pattern for filtering the result. Returns only properties that matches the pattern.
Returns:

List of members.
Return type:

List of Domain

class tangogql.schema.ScalarDeviceAttribute(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
class tangogql.schema.ScalarTypes(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class makes it possible to have input and output of different types.

The ScalarTypes represents a generic scalar value that could be: Int, String, Boolean, Float, List.

static coerce_type(value)[source]¶

This method just return the input value.

Parameters:value – Any
Returns:Value (any)
static parse_literal(node)[source]¶

This method is called when the value of type ScalarTypes is used as input.

Parameters:node – value(any)
Returns:Return an exception when it is not possible to parse the value to one of the scalar types.
Return type:bool, str, int, float or Exception
static parse_value(value)[source]¶

This method is called when an assignment is made.

Parameters:value – value(any)
Returns:value(any)

class tangogql.schema.SetAttributeValue(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class represents the mutation for setting value to an attribute.

mutate(info, device, name, value)[source]¶

This method sets value to an attribute.

Parameters:
  • device (str) – Name of the device
  • name (str) – Name of the attribute
  • value (int, str, bool or float) – The value to be set
Returns:

Return ok = True and message = Success if successful, False otherwise. When an input is not one the scalar types or an exception has been raised while setting the value returns message = error_message.
Return type:

SetAttributeValue
